title: Pink vanilla cupcakes
ingredients: ['For the cupcakes', '175g (6oz) softened butter', '175g (6oz) caster sugar', '175g (6 oz) self raising flour', '3 large egss, beaten', 'few drops of vanilla', 'pink gel food colouring', 'For the buttercream', '100g white chocolate', '2 tablespoons milk', '140g (5 oz) unsalted butter, softened', '275g icing sugar', '1 teaspoon of vanilla', 'To decorate', 'Pink sugar sprinkles', 'Hearts cut out of rollable fondant']
